stories.text: 4 years ago I failed the Comptia Network+ twice, then gave up. Now, this past two months I've failed the AZ-900 Azure Fundamentals twice. I feel I study alot and really understand the material. I just cant pass these certifications. It really gets me down and demotivates me from studying more. Anyone else stuggle with these and how did you overcome this?
stories.title: Ask HN: Failing Certifications

stories.text:
Hi,

does anybody know a similar library like Python Whoosh for Crystal or Go?

https://whoosh.readthedocs.io

I found https://blevesearch.com but it seems you can index only strings and not any kind data (ignored my integers from a JSON file)
stories.title: Ask HN: Python Whoosh equivalent for Crystal-lang or Go-lang?
